div.style: font-family: 微软雅黑; text-align: center; font-size: 13px; vertical-align: middle; color: rgb(255, 230, 204); font-weight: bold; line-height: 16px; width: 149px; word-break: break-word; border: 0px;

vertical-align: top; text-align: center; color: rgb(50, 50, 50); line-height: 16px; font-size: 13px; font-family: 微软雅黑; white-space: nowrap; display: inline-block; background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
font-family: 微软雅黑; text-align: center; font-size: 13px; vertical-align: middle; color: rgb(255, 230, 204); font-weight: bold; line-height: 16px; width: 149px; word-break: break-word; border: 0px;
vertical-align: top; text-align: center; color: rgb(50, 50, 50); line-height: 16px; font-size: 13px; font-family: 微软雅黑; white-space: nowrap; display: inline-block; background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
font-family: 微软雅黑; text-align: center; font-size: 13px; vertical-align: middle; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-weight: bold; line-height: 16px; width: 416px; word-break: break-word; border: 0px;

foreignObject.div:
1.根据模块树,完成对state树的构建
2. 当前模块本地上下文构建local
3.在center实例的_muattions[type]上注册wrappedMutationHandler
4.在center实例的_actions[type]上注册wrappedActionHandler
5.在center实例的_wrappedGetters[type]上注册wrappedGetter

div.style: vertical-align: top; text-align: center; color: rgb(50, 50, 50); line-height: 16px; font-size: 13px; font-family: 微软雅黑; white-space: nowrap; display: inline-block; background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
font-family: 微软雅黑; text-align: center; font-size: 13px; vertical-align: middle; color: rgb(255, 230, 204); font-weight: bold; line-height: 16px; width: 149px; word-break: break-word; border: 0px;
vertical-align: top; text-align: center; color: rgb(50, 50, 50); line-height: 16px; font-size: 13px; font-family: 微软雅黑; white-space: nowrap; display: inline-block; background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
font-family: 微软雅黑; text-align: center; font-size: 13px; vertical-align: middle; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-weight: bold; line-height: 16px; width: 270px; word-break: break-word; border: 0px;

foreignObject.div:
1.利用new Vue({})转化成响应式
2. 将state转化成data属性
3.将getter转化成computed

div.style: vertical-align: top; text-align: center; color: rgb(50, 50, 50); line-height: 16px; font-size: 13px; font-family: 微软雅黑; white-space: nowrap; display: inline-block; background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
font-family: 微软雅黑; text-align: center; font-size: 13px; vertical-align: middle; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-weight: bold; line-height: 16px; width: 176px; word-break: break-word; border: 0px;

vertical-align: top; text-align: center; color: rgb(50, 50, 50); line-height: 16px; font-size: 13px; font-family: 微软雅黑; white-space: nowrap; display: inline-block; background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
font-family: 微软雅黑; text-align: center; font-size: 13px; vertical-align: middle; color: rgb(255, 230, 204); font-weight: bold; line-height: 16px; width: 117px; word-break: break-word; border: 0px;
vertical-align: top; text-align: center; color: rgb(50, 50, 50); line-height: 16px; font-size: 13px; font-family: 微软雅黑; white-space: nowrap; display: inline-block; background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
font-family: 微软雅黑; text-align: center; font-size: 13px; vertical-align: middle; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-weight: bold; line-height: 16px; width: 317px; word-break: break-word; border: 0px;

foreignObject.div: 1.在实例化每个组件时, 使得当前组件的this.$center指向根组件(就是new Vue(..)里的center实例)

div.style: vertical-align: top; text-align: center; color: rgb(50, 50, 50); line-height: 16px; font-size: 13px; font-family: 微软雅黑; white-space: nowrap; display: inline-block; background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
font-family: 微软雅黑; text-align: center; font-size: 13px; vertical-align: middle; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-weight: bold; line-height: 16px; width: 116px; word-break: break-word; border: 0px;
vertical-align: top; text-align: center; color: rgb(50, 50, 50); line-height: 16px; font-size: 13px; font-family: 微软雅黑; white-space: nowrap; display: inline-block; background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
font-family: 微软雅黑; text-align: center; font-size: 13px; vertical-align: middle; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-weight: bold; line-height: 16px; width: 457px; word-break: break-word; border: 0px;

foreignObject.div: 1.执行center._mutations[type], 里面包含用户写的mutation 2. 会执行我们定义的 mutation 函数，并传入当前模块的 state

div.style: font-family: 微软雅黑; text-align: center; font-size: 13px; vertical-align: middle; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-weight: bold; line-height: 16px; width: 116px; word-break: break-word; border: 0px;
vertical-align: top; text-align: center; color: rgb(50, 50, 50); line-height: 16px; font-size: 13px; font-family: 微软雅黑; white-space: nowrap; display: inline-block; background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
vertical-align: top; text-align: center; color: rgb(50, 50, 50); line-height: 16px; font-size: 13px; font-family: 微软雅黑; white-space: nowrap; display: inline-block; background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
vertical-align: top; text-align: center; color: rgb(50, 50, 50); line-height: 16px; font-size: 13px; font-family: 微软雅黑; white-space: nowrap; display: inline-block; background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
font-family: 微软雅黑; text-align: center; font-size: 13px; vertical-align: middle; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-weight: bold; line-height: 16px; width: 357px; word-break: break-word; border: 0px;

foreignObject.div: 1.执行center._actions[type], 里面包含用户写action 2. 会执行我们定义的 action 函数，并传入当前模块的local 3. 用Promise.all()处理多个异步

div.style: vertical-align: top; text-align: center; color: rgb(50, 50, 50); line-height: 16px; font-size: 13px; font-family: 微软雅黑; white-space: nowrap; display: inline-block; background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
